name: Payfirma
description: Payfirma develops payment processing applications to enable businesses to accept credit & debit cards in their stores, online and on their mobile devices. We bring enterprise level payment systems to small businesses in a simple package with amazing customer service. Thousands of users, from small business to multi-national corporations, use Payfirma’s financial technologies to make payments simpler.
